import "./style.scss" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import { faCircleUser } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" import { useForm } from "react-hook-form" import React from "react" import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { login, logout } from "../../features/user/userSlice" const Form = () => { const count = useSelector((state) => state.user.islogged) const dispatch = useDispatch() const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm() const onSubmit = (login) => dispatch(login()) return (

) } export default Form
